cards.rules_text:
Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Deathblade Trainee gets +2/+0 as long as you’ve reached godhood.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B}.

Create a 2/2 black Homunculus creature token.
Bloodborn 3—{B} [i]({B}: Exile this from your graveyard with three gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]
When Crumbling Corpse dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Each player loses 2 life.

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Raven’s Reaver has deathtouch and lifelink as long as you’ve reached godhood.

When Blossoming Corpse enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Eye creature token.
{2}, Discard two cards: Return Blossoming Corpse from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Reaper of Sotak enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, create two 1/1 white Eye creature tokens.
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, Sotak’s Huntsman enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Deathtouch
Effigy {2}{B} [i](When you discard this card, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it except it’s a 1/1 Construct creature.)[/i]
When Grim Anchorite dies, reveal the top card of your library. If it’s a creature card or a land card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put that card into your graveyard.
Gore-Fed Guardian enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if a creature died this turn.
When Primal Pontiff dies, intone. [i](To intone, either put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Blood token.)[/i]

Trample
When Gnarled Wastrel dies, create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
When Guttural Outcast enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, draw a card.
Will of the Supplicants gets +1/+1 as long as you control three or more creatures.
When Sinister Beastcaller enters the battlefield, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {2}.
Trample
{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Carrion Goliath gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
This spell cost {1} less to cast for each permanent put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.
Trample
Whenever you cast a spell with bloodborn, put a +1/+1 counter on Viscera Eater.

When Knight of Ruin enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
• Sacrifice an artifact. When you do, Knight of Ruin deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
When Disciple of Sotak enters the battlefield or dies, create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
When Viscera Thrasher enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

Menace
Whenever Ashen Penitant deals combat damage to a player, create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
When Crimson Cultist enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 white Eye creature token.

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Outrider of Sotak has trample and haste as long as you’ve reached godhood.
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Blood or pay {1}.
Whenever Flesh-Mad Savage attacks, you may sacrifice a Blood. If you, Flesh-Mad Savage gains menace until end of turn.

Haste
{2}: Burning Shade gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever you draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, put a +1/+1 counter on Wizened Disciple.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice God-Watched Acolyte: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

When Knight of Wrack enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
• Sacrifice an artifact. When you do, return target creature to its owner’s hand.

Flying
{3}{U}: Target Mystic you control gains flying until end of turn.
When Exultant Cultist dies, draw a card.
When Grim Iconoclast enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, draw a card.

Flying
When Acolyte of Mabrea enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

Ward {3} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)[/i]
Great Worm’s Progeny has flying as long as you control a Mystic.
Effigy {U} [i](When you discard this card, you may pay {U}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it except it’s a 1/1 Construct creature.)[/i]
When Journeying Pilgrim dies, create a 1/1 white Eye creature token.

Flying
Whenever Breathweaver Acolyte attacks, another target attacking Mystic gains flying until end of turn.
Vigilance

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Ineffable Incense gets +2/+1 as long as you’ve reached godhood.
Flying
Lifelink

Flying
When Departing Soul dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

When Sacrificial Ghoul enters the battlefield, put a stun counter on target creature an opponent controls. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Night’s Harbinger gets +2/+1 as long as you’ve reached godhood.

When Faceless Executioner enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faceless Executioner leaves the battlefield.

Vigilance
When Harried Ancient enters the battlefield, if you’ve reached godhood, create two 1/1 white Eye creature tokens.

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Destroy target creature if it’s tapped or if you’ve reached godhood.

Enchant creature or artifact
Enchanted permanent is a Blood artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.” and it loses all other abilities.

Choose one or both —
• Destroy target creature token.
• Create a 1/1 white Eye creature token.

Target attacking or blocking creature phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don’t exist until its controller’s next turn.)[/i]
Draw a card.

Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has vigilance.
Equip {2}

Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Bloodborn 2—{W} [i]({W}: Exile this from your graveyard with two gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Intone. [i](To intone, either put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Blood token.)[/i]
When Ardent Kouropalates dies, intone. [i](To intone, either put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Blood token.)[/i]

Choose two. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Create a 1/1 white Eye creature token.
• Intone. [i](To intone, either put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Blood token.)[/i]

Flash
When Avenger of the First Ones enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of creatures you control.
When Perverter of Slumber enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Defender
Shackled Sacrifice can attack as though it didn’t have defender as long as you attack with two or more other creatures.

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Adorned Exemplar has double strike as long as you’ve reached godhood.

Flying
When Bonded Scrivener enters the battlefield, draw a card.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on Legion of the Cold Sun.
Put target creature into its owner’s library just beneath the top seven cards of that library

When Palimpsest enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Palimpsest leaves the battlefield.
Effigy {2}{W} [i](When you discard this card, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it except it’s a 1/1 Construct creature.)[/i]

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you’ve reached godhood, those creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn instead.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and vigilance.
When enchanted creature dies, return either it or Ascendance to its owner’s hand.
Each player can’t cast spells with mana value greater than the number of lands that player controls.
Effigy {U} [i](When you discard this card, you may pay {U}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it except it’s a 1/1 Construct creature.)[/i]

Enchant creature
When Frozen Blood enters the battlefield, if you’ve sacrificed a permanent this turn, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.

You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, look at the top six cards of your library. Otherwise, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you sacrifice a Blood.

When Gore Exemplar enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Bloods you control have “{T}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card, then discard a card.”

Constructs you control get +1/+0.

This spell costs {1} less for each card you’ve discarded this turn.

Bloodborn 2—{U} [i]({U}: Exile this from your graveyard with two gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]

Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.

Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.”
Remove up to two counters from target permanent or target card in exile.

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless you’ve reached godhood.

When Graven Abomination enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Effigy {3}{B} [i](When you discard this card, you may pay {3}{B}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it except it’s a 1/1 Construct creature.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, you may discard two cards. If you do, create a 2/2 black Homunculus creature token.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Blood Speaker. If you do, search your library for a Demon card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever a Demon enters the battlefield under your control, return Blood Speaker from your graveyard to your hand.

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Muse of Gluttony. Put two +1/+1 counters on it instead if you’ve reached godhood.

Harvester of the Lost can’t block.
You may cast Harvester of the Lost from your graveyard as long as you’ve reached godhood.

{1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nether Orb: Exile all graveyards.
Effigy {B} [i](When you discard this card, you may pay {B}. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it except it’s a 1/1 Construct creature.)[/i]
Destroy target enchantment you don’t control. You lose 3 life.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains “Whenever this creature dies, exile it. When you do, destroy target creature an opponent controls.”
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, you gain 1 life.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard a card.
Target player reveals three cards from their hand. If the additional cost was paid, instead that player reveals all the cards in their hand. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonland permanent.
Search your library for a card that shares a type with the sacrificed permanent, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Blood token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. If you’ve reached godhood, they gain trample until end of turn.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

Enchant creature

As long as you’ve reached godhood, enchanted creature is a 7/7 Demon God with indestructible in addition to its other types and abilities.

You may sacrifice Anointed Chosen rather than another permanent you control to pay a cost.

When The Sins of Impure Blood enters the battlefield, intone, then The Sins of Impure Blood deals damage to up to any target equal to the number of Bloods you control. [i](To intone, either put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Blood token.)[/i]

• Destroy target artifact.

{U}{R} BLOOD The holy blood sings your name. Drink deep.

Choose two —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

• Glory — Non-God creatures have base power and toughness 3/3.
• Despair — Non-God creatures have base power and toughness 1/1.

Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]

Herald of Forbiddance has hexproof as long as it’s tapped.

When Moment of Ascendance enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant permanent. Search your library for an enchantment or land card, put it onto the battlefield, shuffle, and attach Moment of Ascendance to it.
Enchanted permanent is a 4/4 green God creature.

Choose a nonland card type. When you do, target opponent chooses a player. Reveal cards from the top of the chosen player’s library until you reveal a card of the chosen type. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then the chosen player shuffles.

Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If X is five or more, you may instead search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value X or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
